BattleCardAbility.Desc: Can only be used at Emotion Level 5 and above
[Combat Start] When inflicting Burn using Combat Pages this Scene, inflict 2 additional stacks
This page can be reused only after 4 scenes
[On Hit] inflict 4 Burn
[On Use] A random ally gains 2 Strength and 2 Haste next Scene
[Combat Start] Draw 1 Page
If this page is still in hand, discard this page and respond to a one-side attack with dice from this page
[Combat Start] Reduce target's Power by 1 for the duration of the Scene
[On Play] Disappear from Battlefield for 2 Scene. Recover all Light and draw 6 Pages when returning.
It can be used again 3 Scenes after reappearance
[On Play] Force allied Puppeteer to use "Conjoins with Red String" against the target
Can use multiple in one Scene.
[On Use] Inflict 2 "Red Strings" next Scene
[On Use] If an allied and alive Mx. Bunny is present, make it use this page against the target again.
[Combat Start] If there are counter dice unused at the end of the Scene, draw 1 Page and recover 2 Light.
[Combat Start] At the end of the Scene, if target is Staggered, All allies draw 3 Pages and recover 3 Light.
[Combat Start] for the dureation of rest of the Scene, increase the target's received Damage and Stagger Damage by 50%
[On Hit] Inflict 1 Puppet String next Scene
If have achieved a successful hit with this page, inflict 1 Puppet String next Scene
[Combat Start] Gain 1 Block die (3-8) for each Pages targeting the user
Same effect do not stack
[On Hit] Transform 3 random Pages in target's deck
For each 20 health recovered during this Act increase the Maximun value of the second die by +2
This page can be reused only after 4 scenes
[On Hit] Inflict 2 [Recovery Hijack] next Scene
If have achieved a successful hit with this page, inflict [Unjust Contract: Power] next Scene
If have achieved a successful hit with this page, inflict [Unjust Contract: Protection next Scene
If have achieved a successful hit with this page, inflict [Unjust Contract: Haste] next Scene
[On Play] Spawns a Shade copying the target's Combat Pages and Passive ability.
[In a Clash] Reduce the incoming Damage and Stagger Damage from the Target's Die by -35%
[On Use] if target is inflicted with [Unjust Contract], Recover 1 Light and return this Page to the Hand
[On Hit] Purge Targets' [Strength]/[Endurance]/[Protection]/[Stagger Protection]
For each stack that is removed, inflict 4 Damage to Target
This page can be reused only after 4 scenes
[On Use] Recover 1 Light
[Cambat Start] All Dice gain +1 Power for the duration of the Scene
